availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Brown County, Ohio, laborer. Ohio native. Married to Martha Stalcup Fennel. Father of Eliza J. Fennel, Clarinda Fennel, William M. Fennel, Charles Fennel, Mary Alice Fennel. Laborer in Brown County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Brown County, Ripley, p. 59-60.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Ohio, Brown County, Ripley Union Township, p. 342.
Ohio, County Marriage Records, Various Ohio County Courthouses, Brown County Marriages, Film #000364719, p. 320, (accessed via ancestry.com).
